website_summaries.verdict: Children who tend to spit out their food will find great cleanliness with this catch-all bib.
pros: Large extended front pocket easily catches messes
Neck is adjustable for child's comfort and growth
Silicone easy to clean with a simple rinse in soapy water
Comes in a pack of two
cons: Child's hair can get stuck in neck adjustment

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately these bibs left a mark on my sons neck ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these bibs left a mark on my sons neck that lasted for hours after one use. These might be more appropriate for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pros-easy to wash, baby unable to remove, flexible material Cons- the bibs caused skin irritation on neck. The part near the baby's chest is too raised The food got to the baby's neck folds. Perhaps things would be better when the baby is off puréed foods
customer_reviews.author: La gal

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying different bibs to see which one was the best for my baby and this one is by far the worst. First of all, it’s nearly impossible to put on a hungry baby since the attachment point has to be carefully inserted. Then the whole thing is bulky and heavy. And finally, while it does wash the easiest from all the products I’ve purchased, it pulls on my baby’s hair! I regret this purchase and there is nothing the seller can do to right this wrong. It simply did not work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Bjorn bibs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a more malleable alternative after my LO revolted at the rigid Bjorn bibs. These were easy to put on and look much more comfortable They are just as functional as the Bjorn bibs and just as easy to clean. Winner! The only thing that could make these more awesome is if they were made in America (and I'd be willing to pay a price premium for that), but I have otherwise no real complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Sophy

customer_reviews.title: Um, hello new best friend!
customer_reviews.text: Um, hello new best friend! That's how I feel about these bibs. They are super soft and malleable and catch so much food! I've been using them with my 7 month old daughter for a month now and they're a huge help with after meal clean up. I mean look at the aftermath of spaghetti dinner - the bib and tray took the beating like a champ and there were only a couple of tiny pieces in her actual chair. AMAZING! We hand wash them and they still look great - no stains or signs of wear. I would 100% recommend these to my relatives, friends, and random people walking down the street.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Better than tommie Tippie version
customer_reviews.text: Once you try this type of bib, you just can’t go back to regular bibs! It is so much easier to wipe it down then to wash several regular bibs in the washing machine. I like this brand better than the Tommie Tippy version. It has more adjustable notches for a little more of a snug fit around the neck. My baby had a food line around his neck with tommie Tippie but not with this brand. The material is flexible so it’s adjusts to baby for snug but not chocking fit. It fits my baby and my 2 year old son. Love that it catches dropped food...less waist. Makes meal time cleanup much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Happy Repeat Customer!
customer_reviews.text: We're repeat customers! We bought these for our first kid, and, when we lost one after having our second, we came right back here to get more! They are super flexible and easy to fold so we can stuff them into a diaper bag or purse, and they are SO EASY TO CLEAN. We can just wipe them off when we wipe off the girls and throw them right back in the bag so they're ready for next time! AMAZING. They also catch EVERYTHING, so no more "clean shirt, messy pants" days! We traded a dozen regular bibs that we were always trying to launder for 3 of these and are so glad we did! We HIGHLY recommend these (obviously)!
customer_reviews.author: nabibarr

customer_reviews.title: Skin burn??!??!?
customer_reviews.text: Well I was super excited for these since they seem easier to clean and perhaps more durable than traditional bibs, but after only a few days they gave my baby red raw sores on the back of her neck. It looked like a chemical burn. No thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the green/teal set when my daughter just started solids/regular food at about 7 months old. I love how easily they can be rinsed and cleaned in no time. My daughter just turned a year old and I just bought another set of pink/purple this time. These things catch everything! She will munch on the food that fell into the catcher. I love how the bib is soft, flexible and not too stiff. The neck size adjustment is perfect as she grows. I always keep 1 in the diaper bag, 1 at daycare, and 2 at home. Works perfectly for us and we recommend to our friends. These bibs are worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Alessi86

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up long.
customer_reviews.text: These bibs wash up great, are very soft and a good size for a smaller baby. I started using them when my son was 6m they were a little big but not for long. Unfortunately they didn't last long before the button hole ripped though, less then 6m. I have used the Tommee Tippee bibs for 10 years for my daycare and they hold up for years. I even run them through the dishwasher. I only tried these because the Tommee Tippee bibs are a little big for a small baby, better for 12+. Now that my son will be 1 I will get him the Tommee Tippee bibs but they were great to get him to this point.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina L.

customer_reviews.title: The only bibs you'll need for feeding solids
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how long I went feeding my baby with cloth bibs with solid foods. Messy messy messy. This is so convenient. Catches most food that drops. Super easy to clean (just rinse quick in the sink). I've been using these for several months and they have held up well and look as good as the day I bought them. Easy to roll up and put in a diaper bag too. Also has caught the one time he threw up his dinner (everything caught in the bib!). You will not be disappointed if you buy this bib set! I wish someone had purchased this for my baby shower because I used cloth bibs for far too long!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans easy toddler loves the bib.
customer_reviews.text: my daughter had this bib given as a gift and she used it all the time. I wanted to buy her and Grandma one for when the wee one is visiting. This helps the little one stay clean and dry. The bonus when the toddler drops their food it lands in the bib pocket and they grab the dropped food out to eat this keeps the toddler a bit entertained at the table so parents can eat in peace. The bib is very easy to put on and hand wash up. Forget cloth or plastic bibs these bibs are game changers these are Grandma aproved.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Like the pocket, but silicone grabs hair
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are great ... for babies with very short hair. It is a little hard getting the closure on sometimes, but love the pocket. However, my baby has a bit of hair in back (not much, not even enough for a pony tail) and wails every time we try to put this bib on her because the silicone is very grabby when it comes to her hair. We had to stop using them because she'd cry whenever she saw them, and no matter how careful we were some of her hair always stuck to it. I would buy it is I had a boy whose hair would be kept short and out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Aarin Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: Great, catch food well.
customer_reviews.text: These are great - they catch falling food well and keep our daughter's chest clean and dry during mealtimes. The silicone is pretty thick so holds its form but malleable enough to roll up to stick in a bag. Liquid can tip out of the bib if there is a lot in there and the child leans over or to the side though as a mommy hack you can stick a little paper napkin in the trough of the bib to help reduce this kind of spill with very liquidy foods/drinks. My only complaint is that for kids with longer hair, it can be hard to close the bib without catch some hair in the snap/button closure.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Mess saver and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love these silicone bibs. Here's the lowdown: 1. These bib have a nice big lip to collect food. The lip even collect liquid spills like soup or milk. 2. Easy to clean. These are dishwasher safe and always come our looking great. 3. Easy to put on: the bibs have three holes and three rubber buttons at the back of the neck. This allows the size to be adjusted and you can double button to help stop your little one removing it (which is pretty hard to do). 4. Colors are fun and don't fade over time.
customer_reviews.author: Tori P.

customer_reviews.title: Believe the good reviews!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are right - these are awesome. I’m a mom of four and I’ve tried everything. There are other bibs for full coverage when feeding purées by spoon, but these bibs are great for when babies start feeding themselves! Babies are learning how to grab or pinch the food and they drop so much! I pull out the tray just a notch more than usual to make room for the bib, and 90% of dropped food falls in the pocket. I scoop it out and let her try again! Some will still get in her high chair, but I always bathe right after dinner and this bib makes the clean-up so much faster.
customer_reviews.author: CaliMom

customer_reviews.title: Favorite baby bib!
customer_reviews.text: PROs: -Dishwasher safe -Flexible and soft -EASY clean up -Pocket to catch food stays open -Multiple sizing buttons CONs: -No sleeves -Does rip on the button holes after being yanked off repeatedly by the baby over months. UPDATE: The current version has been updated to have a lining around each hole, which should help a lot with the ripping that the older version had. Thank you!! OVERALL: LOVE THESE! And bought a second set for the next baby. :)
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: keeps it's shape!
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are so awesome! I randomly selected them to add to my baby registry almost 2 years ago now & I'm SO glad I did. I've visited friends/family & borrowed their pocket bibs, but they are basically worthless b/c the pockets don't stick out - these bibs have kept their shape perfectly & collected lots of food/liquids since my son started eating solid foods & feeding himself. I usually wipe them down with a wet paper towel after a meal, but they've been through the dishwasher lots of times too & still look/work great! I've recommended & purchased them for friends already. :)
customer_reviews.author: Gertrude (Bell) Gusewelle

customer_reviews.title: New version, prefer old
customer_reviews.text: We got these about 2 years ago when we were expecting (that's too early IMO), and then wanted more recently so I bought another set. The original set had the pegs and holes to put the bib on and it was super easy to get on and off and never ripped or fell off. Now they reinforced the holes so its a much tighter squeeze to pop the pegs through the holes and I don't like it as much. Still a solid product but a good amount more difficult to use now.
customer_reviews.author: Delayed Gratification

customer_reviews.title: We Wish We Found This Sooner
customer_reviews.text: We wish we had found these sooner. We used vinyl/polyester bibs and plastic bibs until we finally found these silicone ones. These are so much easier to clean than the ones we previously used; just hand wash or stick them in the dishwasher. We've had no issues with these bibs. The best feature we've found is it doesn't soak up water like a sponge! It just gets caught in the catcher. This is very helpful with a drooly baby or if your child is like ours and spits out water or juice for fun. If you're a new parent or are still looking for the right bib, then definitely consider giving these a try.
customer_reviews.author: cmoo

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These bibs really do protect and aren’t stiff. Our four month old granddaughter doesn’t object to it. When our children were babies we sometimes found that the rigid plastic was uncomfortable. The button at the neck could stand to be a little stiffer as it’s difficult to push through the buttonhole but that’s a minor criticism and it’s easy enough two-handed because you can push it through from the back.
customer_reviews.author: CFE

customer_reviews.title: These are the best bibs
customer_reviews.text: You can make a bib out of lots of different materials. For babies, silicone is durable, soft, has a great trough to catch food that drops, and basically lasts for years. I've tried posting videos of babies before and had my reviews deleted, but it is hilarious to see her scooping her favorite foods out of the bib, since she likes to feed herself, and doesn't want to miss any [yogurt] that has initially gotten away.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P. Spinella

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleanup!
customer_reviews.text: We love these bibs. They are durable and easy to clean. It did take the baby a little time to get used to them, but now he associates them with eating. We can let him feed himself and learn to drink from a sippy cup, knowing that clean up will be a relative snap and his clothes will be relatively unscathed through the event. All we have to do is worry about the food in his hair, his arm, on his cheek, forehead, behind his ear and the dog!
customer_reviews.author: Mrsjr

customer_reviews.title: Great bib
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are terrific for the price. They are a softer, flimsier plastic than the Bjornbaby equivalent. They fold up easily into a diaper bag. Because they are a flimsier material, they might tear more easily, but ours are holding up just fine so far. The design is great; they catch all that loose food from going down into the kiddo's lap, and they're fairly easy to put on and off (and _very_ easy to clean). Very pleased with this purchase for the price, and I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix_AZ_1899

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these. I bought two awhile back to try. Loved them so much I bought two more. The colors are vibrant. The material is soft and pliable. The pouch keeps so much food from falling on the floor. I am careful when I undo them to take off so as not to tear the holes. I run a home day care and have three little ones who use these at each meal. There is much less mess on the kids and on the floor. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Had to replace my Bjorns
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Id been using the baby Bjorn hard trough bibs since I had my first daughter. We loved those and people always commented on them! But we left at my in-laws on our last visit. I got on amazon, where else, to replace them and happened to see these. Thought wed give them a try and glad I did! The only thing i like more about the bjorn ones was that they were easier to clean because they were stiffer and didnt flop all over (thats what she said) but the flexibility of these will be great for travel packing!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany richards

customer_reviews.title: BEST BIBS
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these after trying a different brand that was half cloth/half silicone. The other brand developed mold despite washing immediately. This tray collects most of the food for my toddler to fish back out for round 2 and is easy to clean. Save your money and just buy these. We only have a 2 pack because they’re that easy to clean and reuse. They also fold up great in a diaper bag for going out.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bib
customer_reviews.text: I love these bibs!! I was looking to buy more bibs like the cheekybaby one that we have and these are even better! She refuses to wear the babybjorn bib and she can easily take it off so we needed something that was silicone (soo easy to wipe off!), flexible, and difficult for a 1.5yo to get off on her own ;) This bib has a big pocket for collecting dropped food, rolls up easy to put in the diaper bag, and seems to be great quality! Best of all it didn't end up across the room 10 seconds after I put it on!
customer_reviews.author: 3lgal

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 issues with these bibs: 1) they rub on baby's neck and leave red marks. Since he can't talk I have no idea if it's uncomfortable, but it looks like it might be. 2) food gets under the bib around the neck even when it's on the tightest notch. So while the bib does protect the front of his clothing he still gets very messy around his neck. They are easy to clean, durable, and the front pocket is nice for catching all the food.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Latching mechanism is clunky. Babies hair gets stuck every time i try to put the bib on because of which baby starts crying. Makes feeding food twice as difficult as baby's now cranky. Secondly as silicone does not soak water, water flows down the neck of baby and makes his clothes wet. We have to change his clothes after every feeding session. I would rather go for some fabric (cotton) bibs instead.
customer_reviews.author: prosenjit sen

customer_reviews.title: NEVER GOING BACK TO FABRIC BIBS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! I have them in every color, and my kids STILL use them to this day (they're 3 & 5). They catch everything, even liquid! I also give these as baby shower presents, so new parents never have to wonder why they make cloth bibs that will stain at the first sight of babies eating by themselves. Spaghetti sauce anyone? Just rinse these bibs off and throw them in the dishwasher. I've also had these for over 4 years, and they're STILL going strong. Haven't had to replace them yet, and they're used at every meal - every day.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Best bibs ever!
customer_reviews.text: My mom is obsessed with these bibs - thinks they are the greatest invention of all time and comments every time we eats with us that she wishes there was something like it when we were babies. These are soft, flexible plastic. They have multiple holes for different size necks. They have a large "trough" to catch dropped food. Most importantly, they can be dunked in water or wiped clean after meals. They also roll up easily to tuck in a diaper bag for traveling, restaurants, etc. I'll never use another bib or a cloth bib again if I have the choice. Honestly, they are that amazing.
customer_reviews.author: girl

customer_reviews.title: Great concept and soft silicone
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving them a 3 star for two reasons the concept is great and would save me from doing laundry and stain removal. However my 12 month old screams and cries when I put it on her. It's very heavy for her and pulls on her hair and skin on her neck. Second reason is the seller actually contacted me and gave me a refund when I brought the issue my little one had. These are better I think for an older toddler. I hope she can use these in the future. It's a soft silicon that looks like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: LinaP

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: Seriously? Why did it take me 4 babies before I realized I needed these in my life? How many outfits could have been saved! How many baths could have been avoided? These are life-savers, clothes-savers, and sanity-savers all in one. I keep one in the diaper bag at all times so if we ever decide to just stop and eat somewhere, we have a clean and easy way to do it. I will never go back to any other kind of bib . . . .
customer_reviews.author: mama llama

customer_reviews.title: Best all-around bibs for feedings
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are awesome. Easy to fasten (and not quite so easy for the baby to pull off), easy to clean (you can even put them in the dishwasher), easy to store (roll up and shove into a diaper bag), and great at keeping food off the baby's lap because the pouch actually holds its shape (unlike some cloth/plastic hybrid bibs where the pouch is essentially useless). We've used lots of bibs over the years, and I do like the waterproof green sprouts bibs for drooling babies, but as far as eating goes these are by far the best. Wish they had been around for my oldest many years ago, but we're definitely getting good use out of them now!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Loved for our first, doesn’t work as well with #2
customer_reviews.text: We loved these bibs for my son and ordered more for my daughter but with her they seem to get in the way of the tray and her reaching for food. She gets frustrated then picks up the bib and tries to chew on that. :-) But they’re super soft, last forever and ours haven’t stained in 2 years’ use. So you might love them. We’ll try again when she’s a bit bigger (to be fair, she’s 8 months and in size 24 month clothes so I’m not sure how much “bigger” she needs to be for them to work for her).
customer_reviews.author: JLChristine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bibs
customer_reviews.text: I was always hesitant of buying these kind of bibs. Now I'm not sure why I ever went withouth them. I'll definitely be buying more! They are so easy to use, clean and take with you wherever you go. My two year old doesn't mind wearing them either, which is good because he usualy rips off his bibs as soon as I put them on. And since these catch food, we have a ton of less mess and he picks it up out of the pouch and eats what he droppped. Buy these!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Conley

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for your baby! Easy to clean and less laundry to do
customer_reviews.text: It’s being amazing! My 13 month old daughter uses this bibs every single day, they are super easy to clean, literally just rinse with soap and wipe to get it dry in 1min or less, I do noticed the reduction in the amount of laundry that I’m washing, I used to use 1 cloth bib for each meal and now we only use this silicone bibs, recommend this product 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Paola Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy residue left behind on blue and red bibs
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought the green and mint colored 2 pack and loved them! Decided to buy the blue and red 2 pack and am disappointed in how they wash. I've tried dishwasher, handwash and just plain wiping them down and they both dry with this horrible cloudy residue left behind. My green and mint bibs wash just fine. Wished I had just bought another pack of those colors. I do not recommend the blue and red.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing for a Behind the Times Grandma
customer_reviews.text: Love these and they were a good price. My daughter-in-law sweetly suggested I toss the cloth bibs and invest in some silicone bibs since we are keeping baby girl twice a week during the shut-down. Seriously why would anybody use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Frances B

customer_reviews.title: Probably our favorite bib yet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our second since he is a messier eater. Pros: Does a great job catching most of the food dropped and is super easy to clean. Easy to put on and take off. Cons: Wish it was available in a bigger size so it covers more space towards the bottom. Also, as some people mentioned, liquids tend to go through the top gap between the neck and the bib which gets the top of the shirts dirty. After having it for 8 months, the area to close the bib is starting to tear around the holes but would definitely purchase again if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: tmn

customer_reviews.title: Too many flaws
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use this bib on my little boy when I started solid food.But now just few weeks and I am so frustrated with this bib,don’t know why so many people bought this at first place.It literally doesn’t fit on my son’s neck properly who is not at all tiny baby but 5 months old and fits in 9 months old dresses.Next problem is the bib is too easy to be pulled out just in one time by a baby so yes you need to constantly keep adjusting.Other than that it doesn’t catch all the food.
customer_reviews.author: alka anand

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: I really really like these bibs. They're so soft and bendable. They're insanely easy to clean. I just rinse them under the kitchen sink and done! We have some other smock type of bibs that are great, but no one ever wants to clean them because you have to really scrub and get into the pockets. These Happy Healthy Parent bibs are really easy and they're cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Z

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my one year old who kept pulling off the Velcro bibs and is a messy eater. Overall they work well. He has been able to pull them loose a could times but he doesn’t seem to want to do it often. It can easily be pulled off though if a baby yanks hard enough. Catches most of the food my little one misses in his mouth when eating so it’s helped good bit to make it less messy at meal times.
customer_reviews.author: D. Laborie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bib
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite bibs for feeding my six-month-old in! I love that they're all-over silicone, which means I can easily wipe, wash, and dry them. They're much better in this regard than another bib we have that's half silicone and half fabric, which makes it take forever to dry. The silicone on these bibs is also soft and flexible, so I don't feel like it's squeezing or rubbing baby's neck uncomfortably. Will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Hayden J

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly, Probably Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in the end of May, for my nephew who I babysit frequently. He's a little over a year old, so he's learning to feeding himself and is very good at missing his mouth or accidentally dropping his food, and this bib catches everything. It's easy to put on and take off of him. Also I love being able to just throw it in the dishwasher or handwash it if I need to use it again. 15 dollars does feel a little steep but I haven't had any issues with it, so maybe it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I would purchase again or not
customer_reviews.text: These are nice enough. Not sure if I would buy then again or not. Within a month or so of use a couple of the knobs where you fasten them broke of and they have also ripped in that area. Not sure if we are just too hard on them when we fasten them or what. Also no matter how tight we close them my kiddo gets food on his clothes under his chin, on the sides, and below the food catcher.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Keller

customer_reviews.title: Best bibs
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bibs I've ever had for feeding baby puree or regular food. We wash them everyday and they hold up probably fine and maintain their shape. The pocket is great for catching food before it falls in the chair. My baby even the food out of the pocket when he drops it. I really wish I had just given in and spent the money on these when my daughter was a baby. They are so much better than the traditional flimsy plastic bibs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Clean-Up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 4-month-old, who has started eating puréed foods and so far I’m impressed. It’s oversized, which is perfect because it covers her shoulders when she’s flailing her sweet potato-covered hands around. It’s also long (goes past her belly button) and protects her entire torso. For reference, my baby girl is currently 14.02lbs and 21.75in in length. Clean up of the bibs is easy—hot water and soap.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Robison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and holds its shape to catch food!
customer_reviews.text: We love these bibs!!! We’ve been using them for 3 years and two kids now. We have three sets in all the non-girl colors. They wipe clean, they’re dishwasher safe and best of all, they hold their shape! There are so many pocket bins out there that stay flat and closed and don’t catch food like they’re meant to which is pointless. These actually stay open and catch the food! When our son wants more, we dump it back into his plate. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best bibs out there
customer_reviews.text: These silicone bibs are the best bibs out there. Yes, they are more expensive, but they are well worth it. These are easy to clean and dry fast. The formed pocket at the bottom does an excellent job of catching all the mess and they're easy to put on and take off. I prefer these over cloth, plastic-lined, and disposable.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieTop Contributor: Philosophy

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bibs
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are exactly as advertised. They are soft, which keeps them from digging into my baby’s neck. The softness also makes them easy to store. They are easy to adjust so that the fit is perfect. They are a cinch to clean, which is always a good thing when you have a little one. They catch the food spills, too. I love the blue and green colors that I ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Romoca

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These are geniuses! I have five kids and a serious anxiety of kids playing in their food at dinner time. It sucks that I didn’t discover these until my last kiddo turnt 2yo, but that’s life! Lol! It catches everything she drops when shoveling food into her mouth, which is a lot! After she’s cleaned her plate she eats what fell into her bib! It’s like getting seconds! Lol! I can see where the silicone will be prone to ripping out sooner or later, tho it hasn’t happened yet. They clean up with a good spray from the sink sprayer and a good wipe with a hand towel.
customer_reviews.author: No Rest

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time mom. I can’t believe I waited until my toddler is 18 months old before I bought this. It minimizes all the food spills and food stains on clothes. I love how my son can still see where his spilled food was going and even eats it from the bib. I thought it was heavy for my baby since it was made of silicone, but it was perfect. He can’t easily remove it unlike the cloth bibs, where he can just pull it out of his neck then spill all the food hanging from the bib. Will definitely buy this for every baby shower I will attend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Tempongko

customer_reviews.title: No need to change our grandson’s clothes after each meal.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed. Our 15 month old grandson is learning how to use a fork & spoon. Much of his food falls off his utensils. These bibs catch all the food that falls. The only ones unhappy with the bibs are the dogs. No more food falling on the floor. We have one bib at our house & the other went home with him.
customer_reviews.author: Midge Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, but fastener broke after a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2-year-old daughter and had really high hopes based on all of the reviews here. These are, by far, the easiest bibs to clean out of any I have used, and the large pocket does an excellent job at catching food. However, after only a couple of weeks of use, the closure on the back of the neck broke. Also, my daughter's hair gets caught in the buttons when I am trying to fasten it around her neck, causing her to wriggle around when her hair gets pulled. If the manufacturer could improve the button fastening system to make it more durable, these would get a 5-star rating from me.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Rickenbach

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver Bib
customer_reviews.text: My baby is just learning to use his hands to eat and this is the most comfortable bib that I bought for far for him as I can see it in his reaction the first time he wore this. This bib is a very soft silicon that in my opinion is harmless on my baby's neck. It has a wide mouth that catches most of the food. Easy to put on my baby's neck and most of all it is easy to clean as long as you clean it by using soap and water, this is also dishwasher safe (top rack). Life saver in short 😊. Definitely recommended to all the mommas with babies like me.
customer_reviews.author: Nash

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Grandson. I wish I would have had some of these when my kids were little. This little silicone bib is very soft and flexible, catches everything in the lower pocket and washes like a dream. I would recommend these to any one with small children, especially those that are learning to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Poodleluv

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, it's that good.
customer_reviews.text: I waited for 2 months to write this review, because I thought for sure these were too good to be true. The things that matter: 1) It goes straight into the dishwasher 2) It catches food when the kids miss or are playing. 3) It stays on 4) Our kids love them. Phenomenal quality. You get what you pay for, I'm so glad I invested in these, I only wish I had them a lot sooner. Thanks for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jay M.

customer_reviews.title: Makes feeding EASY!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little oversized BUT this does not take away from the functionality. Our 6 month grandson was just learning how to be spoon fed and these bibs saved us from a huge cleanup. The silicon construction is 100x better than the cloth bibs and can easily be wiped clean. Feeding and cleanup are the huge benefits! Our grandson is not bothered when placing these on him. I love the multiple settings for adjusting the fitment.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bibs that do the job.
customer_reviews.text: I really like how the pocket part is shaped. It sticks out in front so most of the food is caught. Only downside is the bowl or dish is sometimes pushed forward but I prefer that to food spilled. The holes for the buttons are small, making it not easy to button, but this is probably to prevent babies from easily ripping the bib off their necks. Unlike some reviewers, I personally did not encounter any issue with bib remaining flat when my 18 month old has it on. Overall I really like the coverage and ease of cleaning. Plus it comes with two! Very convenient. I would recommend this bib, especially for parents with toddlers leaning to self feed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: One of the most useful items we've bought for baby
customer_reviews.text: Why have a drawer full of cloth bibs that you have to launder after each use when you can have two of these amazing silicone bibs ever ready? These are so easy to clean and always catch something during meal time. Baby likes them and mama loves them. They are easy to put on and adjust. I attached two hooks to the inside of the cabinet door under the kitchen sink. That's where these two miracle bibs hang. I've never placed them in the dish washer, rather I give them a quick rinse (and occasional scrub) after each use. I recommend them to everyone with a baby!
customer_reviews.author: shana

customer_reviews.title: Pockets worth investing in
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy these so much more than the fabric bibs with pockets we previously used. These pockets actually catch things, the competitor fabric versions just lay flat and only catch things if they slide down the front of the bib and into the pouch. My daughter actually has so much food in her bib now she digs through it after her plate is empty. Wash nicely, they are heavier for my daughter to wear than fabric but she doesn't seem to mind.
customer_reviews.author: BargainHunter

customer_reviews.title: Best bibs EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought us these bibs 3 years ago when we had our first baby. They are still in great shape to this day! I decided to buy more because we ended up having twins and it's more work to keep everything clean so I decided to get back-ups. These bibs are amazing! They're sturdy, soft, and easy to clean!! I would definitely recommend getting these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy For Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Omg I can't believe how much easier these make my life and baby's. I was still using long cloth bibs. I didn't understand why these where sold until baby started spitting food out and making triple the amount of mess than usual. Baby is a toddler now so it's expected. I wish Someone may have told me about these or bought them for me.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Silicone bibs are amazing! I love that the pocket really catches everything, even liquid, and that at the end of the day i can wash it in the sink with the baby bottles. The o ly issue I have with it is one of the bibs seems to have a little cut in the pocket. It doesnt effect its use and it's fine for now but these weren't cheap so I expected them to be perfect and I'm afraid of it tearing in the future.
customer_reviews.author: TheDyes

customer_reviews.title: These two bibs have changed my life. Seriously. ...
customer_reviews.text: These two bibs have changed my life. Seriously. If I could give 10 stars, I would. I had given up on silicone bibs because I had one that was another brand that would always gap right under the chin, so food, liquid, everything would just slide down onto the shirt underneath. These bibs don’t do that!! They have a completely adjustable neck, and the pocket catches (almost) everything. (I mean, let’s face it, a toddler can manage to get food into places you didn’t even know it could go). These bibs should be given to every new parent with the words, “trust me, you will thank me later”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best bibs!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th baby, so I have tried MANY bibs over the years! These bibs are super easy to use, take with you and clean! My baby doesn't mind wearing it, it is soft and comfortable around her neck too! I love that it has the pocket which is so useful!!! It catches most of the foods that she drops and makes clean up so much easier! I simply wash with gentle dish soap right after use. I was hesitant at first to purchase because of the price, but they are definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: These bibs catch the food nicely without being too big to be in the way.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality bib that easily cleans up. I purchased these for my 13 month old who is becoming a more independent eater...who drops a lot of food! He even thinks it's pretty entertaining to dig food out of the pouch and eat it from there! These bibs catch the pieces nicely without being too big to be in the way. Colors are as vibrant as displayed - really pretty. Overall a great product! The only change I might make to them is to have a the closure area be a cotton fabric so it was a bit more comfortable on the neck...then of course they wouldn't clean and dry as easily...so you can't have it all I guess! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for finger food stage
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bibs. They are soft and flexible and perfect for the next stage of self-feeding. I trusted another reviewer who said she liked these ones best. The only thing to be aware of/cautious about is that the flexibility of the “container” part of the bib can mean that the food can come out as you take the bib off the baby. I happen to like the flexibility because it means I can invert the container and wash it out really quickly under the tap. I can imagine other people not liking it though (my cousins kid throws up regularly and she needs a firm container).
customer_reviews.author: A Smart Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST bib, but package was damaged
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two sets of these bibs for my very messy 11 month old and they're excellent, I really can't find any issues with them and I don't bother using other bibs. However, when the second order arrived, the box was torn up and the bibs were almost cut - even the plastic bag inside was cut. They were inside a box that was inside an Amazon box, so I'm not sure how that happened. I wish they weren't wrapped in a plastic bag too, they're already in a cardboard box so the plastic is pointless and more for me to recycle. Please consider getting rid of the plastic packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Garza

customer_reviews.title: best bibs
customer_reviews.text: I compared it to OXO bibs and this is the best one out there. The biggest reason is because oxo has fabric on the top and that can get moldy, takes long to dry. Specially on the go, when you can't clean it until getting home, it molds. Now, these all-silicone bibs are great because you wipe it clean and they are perfectly fine. Obviously you need to clean them with soapy water later on but they dry fast. Also, the OXO are velcro and she takes them off so much faster. These silicone ones are harder to take off. We love these! and the colors are good for girls and boys.
customer_reviews.author: Naty

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Should have got them sooner lol.
customer_reviews.text: I waited awhile to order these because $9 seems like a lot for a bib. So glad I finally did though! My laundry isn't getting as full so fast since they do a better job of protecting my little guy's outfits, and I can often just spray them clean with super hot water. No stains whatsoever!! Not even tomato based stuff which has ruined a lot of his stuff. My kiddo can't rip his bibs off anymore since the fastener is button style rather than Velcro like the crappy pvc ones you have to scrub. Wish they had these with my first kid!
customer_reviews.author: WiskoMommy

customer_reviews.title: Best Bibs
customer_reviews.text: I Love Love Love these bibs!! I purchased another set for my second child, as the other set is still in use! Great customer service as well! After 2 years of use, there are no stains and look as new as the first day purchased! One of the initial bibs is starting to tear where you hook it, but that is after 365 days x 2 years of use!! These are a nice thick quality and dry quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: ... using these bibs over 10 months and they are FANTASTIC. They are nice and flexible which is fantastic ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these bibs over 10 months and they are FANTASTIC. They are nice and flexible which is fantastic and it's comfortable on our son. There's a similar looking product made by another company with a very recognizable brand name that I've tried at a friend's house that is much stiffer and less comfortable. Very easy to wash, you can hand wash, toss them in the dishwasher or even washing machine if you want (but please don't put them in the dryer). Highly recommend these over any other bib I've tried/seen... I'll probably start giving these as gifts too because they are just awesome.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace the plastic bibs I had and I really like these. They are very well made and the bottom catches everything that doesn’t make it into baby’s mouth. I was a little concerned that they would get water stains since I like to air dry but I haven’t had that problem yet. I would highly recommend these bibs if you want something that you don’t have to keep replacing. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: LadyLola

customer_reviews.title: Best Bibs EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I was apprehensive about buying these bibs because of the price. I have a couple of other brands of silicone bibs that were cheaper but don’t love them. After seeing the amount of these that have been sold and the great reviews, I decided to buy a set. What a HUGE difference! They are extremely soft, much wider, and the food catcher in front is bigger! And SO easy to clean too! I have added other colors to our registry! Best bib ever!
customer_reviews.author: Carrieme2sea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like these and so does my 10 month old. It is true that sometimes the part around the neck bunched up which causes food to slip underneath but I've found that's mostly caused by the bib being too big for the baby. It doesn't happen very often anymore and we're still using the smallest setting. It has withstanded multiple hand washes and dishwasher washes. And it seems to never stain which is awesome. I'm so used to baby items always staining. The first time I thought it had stained after washing it but when I checked it again after it dried it was mysteriously gone. It's like it has magical stain fighting powers.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought these earlier!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously wish I bought these earlier. Would have saved me many headaches during mealtimes. The only thing it doesn't catch is if some sort of liquid dribbles down the chin and goes underneath the bib, but in every other aspect, it's amazing. I no longer find food on the booster seat underneath the child, and I no longer have to worry about the dog trying to scavenge whatever is dropped from the table since the bib catches most of it!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great bibs!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bibs for our granddaughter. I wanted some bibs on hand so her parents wouldn’t need to pack them when they come to visit. My daughter really liked them, so I ordered the same brand. The bibs are easy to fasten, stay on great, catch all the food drops and are very easy to clean. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: I wish I bought these sooner!
customer_reviews.text: This item is a must have for 1 year old and older. The neck piece is adjustable also. This item is easy to clean. There is a scoop attached with bib, so food and liquids are caught and not wasted on the clothing. I have zero complaints! This item is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: wrong answer

customer_reviews.title: Great bibs! Easy to clean and helps decrease the mess!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these bibs! We have 6 of them and love how easy they are to clean. The ouch itself is genius and exactly what my toddler has needed since learning to eat. Love that the food drops in the ouch and he can pick it out to eat instead of it going onto the floor. My only complaint is that we have had 2 of them rip in the hole where the latch goes in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: worth it! once you buy, you’ll never go back to old plastic bibs!
customer_reviews.text: wish i had purchased these sooner. been using plastic bibs with fabric edges, they’re impossible to clean and wear out in washing machine. these silicone bibs are a tad smaller but do such a good job catching spills my son actually stays cleaner. put in dishwasher every night! SO MUCH better than other bibs!! worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Design

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: this seems a bit pricy for 2 bibs.. but once you have it in your hand, you'd realize that it deserves the price. we like how good it looks, it has buttons to fit different neck sizes, and is very easy to clean. i wouldn't have any input to make it better, it's that good.! and, about folding, i don't see a need to fold (we just hang it after each use and cleaning).
customer_reviews.author: Geeta Poudel

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: These bibs have too-large neckholes and pocket catches on bottom of tray but biggest problem is my 8 month thinks they’re a chew toy, lifts them up to chew on and dumps food everywhere. ALSO, technically one more dish to wash? I’d rather throw bibs in the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Shaye Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Great bib, just wish it was easier to put on
customer_reviews.text: These work great for catching food and keeping things pretty clean. The only issue we have with them is how difficult it is to get them on our little one. The "clasp" is also made of silicone, so it's more difficult than we would like. I would buy them again, even with the difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine a better version of this product
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased several of these over the past few years. They are easy to use, and they clean up so nicely. We've also travelled with them quite a bit. We just roll them up and button them closed. We just use dish soap and a dish sponge to clean then. It seems like there's not really anything that doesn't clean off of these. In addition, the seller (Happy Healthy Parent) has excellent customer support. I contacted them about an issue and they replaced my item extremely quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought these earlier. They are thinner and more flexible than I expected. I got those because my baby was always pulling on his material bibs and they would get gross fast since we do lots of finger foods. He is 10 months now and these are amazing! It catches the food that won’t go into his tiny mouth (which is like half of it) and he just reaches to the food when he’s done with what is on his tray. Cleaning is SO easy! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: I loved the first set and after 2 years I decided ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these bibs. I loved the first set and after 2 years I decided to buy a second set for my second child. Within one month the strap broke. These ones seem like they are made out of a different material then the older version. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BIBS - your search is over!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried so many types of bibs and these are our absolute favorites. We have been using them about a year now and they are easy to clean and catch so much food when feeding a toddler! I just bought 2 more so I can always have one in the car and an extra in rotation. Seriously if you're looking for a great bib that holds up and will make your life easier catching food instead of on the ground, this is it! You wont regret this purchase - the quality is amazing and second to none. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Buttonhole torn after 6 mos of use
customer_reviews.text: I loved these bibs until the buttonhole we need to use tore and we can no longer use this bib because my baby has such a tiny neck. My baby has been using this from 6 mos until 15 mos and it tore already at 6 mos of use. I used to recommend this to everyone but I don't know if I can anymore. Quality is not good for the price that I paid. At $9/bib this should not happen.
customer_reviews.author: Kang

customer_reviews.title: Good bibs. My only complaints are that they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Good bibs. My only complaints are that they are a little heavy/bulky for infants and somewhat easy for the baby to pull off. My 8-moth-old is very aware of the bib due to it being so bulky and heavy, hence constantly trying to pull it off. I think once he's older, the bibs will work much better. They do do an absolutely fantastic job at catching dropped food and are perfect for restaurants. Would recommend these for ages 1 up.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky140

customer_reviews.title: Stop wasting in the cheaper ones
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them! I wish I listened my husband before! But no, i bought others, the normal ones we find at walmart, didn't like that if I cleaned them take a while to dry and then start to smell bad. I spent more with the cheaper ones, time, money, water, electricity while washing them in washer machine, the clothes... These are the glory! I took them to restaurants and put them while playing and having fruit snacks. They catch everything! My son pick the food and place in mouth again. Purchase these ones since the beginning of foods!!! Believe me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nosproc

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY Bibs we use anymore!! When our twins are done eating, we throw the bibs in the sink with their food dishes, wash them up and they are ready to go for the next round. My son loves the small “troth” at the bottom of the bib to catch his snacks that would usually end up on his pants. I highly recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good bib, but the buttonholes keep tearing
customer_reviews.text: I have twin girls, so I have to buy two of everything. I've bought this 2-pack of bibs three times now thinking that the weak buttonholes in the blue one were an anomaly, but now I can see from the reviews that many people have the same issue. I would have expected better quality for the money. I like this product a lot and I keep buying it because I want the bibs to match my twins' sippy cup colors (so I don't forget who has which cup) but the quality is disappointing. I have attached a picture of the two torn bibs.
customer_reviews.author: SGC

customer_reviews.title: Game changer. Excellent design, so clever!
customer_reviews.text: These are game-changers. Adjustable and concave in the back to nestle onto big, round baby bellies (which photos don't show, and is a clever design feature). They catch almost all of the food DS drops. He does occasionally look down and nibble on whatever he finds. The rinse clean with water and just a drop of soap. Cloth bibs are a waste of time and resources. I will be getting these as baby shower gifts every time.
customer_reviews.author: LaceyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are nicer than most because they go in the dishwasher and the pocket that catches the food stays open so my 8 month old just reaches in and pulls food out that he dropped instead of searching around in his lap for it ( we are doing Baby Led Weaning so no purees other than yogurt, hummus, etc) I also like that it's flexible silicone and not stiff, hard plastic. The neck adjustments should fit him for quite some time as he gets bigger too. No cons here but we have only been using this kind of bib for a week
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is great! When we first received the product
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is great! When we first received the product, it had a weird chemical rubber smell so I contacted the customer service! They got back to me right away and they were happy to send me a replacement. The second one I received was great and it didn’t have a weird smell. It works so well in keeping food from falling all over the floor. The only thing is that our boy pulls on it and it comes off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: jae

customer_reviews.title: The design is brilliant and the number of "buttons" allows for extended use ...
customer_reviews.text: The design is brilliant and the number of "buttons" allows for extended use as the kid grows. Very easy to wash or wipe clean. Can catch quite a bit of food/liquid. The only caveat is making sure to hold on to the "catch pocket" when removing the bib, so as not to spill all the caught food back onto the kid (or yourself). The kid also loves feeding himself from the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: lw4692

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: These bibs fit and stay put even when my baby is wiggly during feeding time. They are super durable, easy to fold and pack in her diaper bag and oh so easy to clean! My dog chewed one up so I bought a different brand of silicone bib from Target in a pinch and it just didn't fit right and even though it was a name brand, it wasn't nearly the quality of these bibs. This is my second purchase I love term so much!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

product_meta.title: Silicone Baby Bibs Easily Wipe Clean - Comfortable Soft Waterproof Bib Keeps Stains Off, Set of 2 Colors (Lime Green/Turquoise)
feature_bullets: LIFETIME MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - If you are not satisfied with our bibs, Happy Healthy Parent will refund your purchase!
BIBS ARE ALWAYS READY TO USE - No more cloth bibs going into the washing machine. Cuts down on laundry and saves water.
EASY CLEAN - 100% Food Grade Silicone resists stains and does not absorb water. JUST USE SOAPY WATER TO WASH IT OFF!
FEEDING MADE SIMPLER - Happy Healthy Parent's philosophy is simple. Happy Kids, Happy Parents. Big, wide pocket catches food, does not spill, and actually stays open!
DOLLARS SAVED - No more buying packages of bibs OR ruining clothes from falling food.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars6,967 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
